import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchReposAction, fetchProfileAction, } from "./redux/slices/reposSlice"; import imgPic from "./img/gith.svg"; function App() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchReposAction("tweneboah")); dispatch(fetchProfileAction("tweneboah")); }, []); const repos = useSelector(state => state?.repos); const { loading, profileLoading, reposList, profile } = repos; console.log(repos); return ( <>
